ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Data sets and scripts for text examples and exercises in P. Dalgaard (2008), `Introductory Statistics with R', 2nd ed., Springer Verlag, ISBN 978-0387790534.
Data sets and scripts for text examples and exercises in P. Dalgaard (2008), `Introductory Statistics with R', 2nd ed., Springer Verlag, ISBN 978-0387790534.

name: r-iswr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.0-11" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-iswr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ISwR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ISwR/ISwR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 31e21ee7733b304041d50e805029d129ddad0ac56452e3fa04f0f5fad9c9e902

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ISwR')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ISwR')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ISwR
  license: GPL-2
  summary: Data sets and scripts for text examples and exercises in P. Dalgaard (2008), `Introductory Statistics with R', 2nd ed., Springer Verlag, ISBN 978-0387790534.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: ISwR
# Version: 2.0-8
# Date: 2019-12-30
# Title: Introductory Statistics with R
# Author: Peter Dalgaard
# Maintainer: Peter Dalgaard <pd.mes@cbs.dk>
# Description: Data sets and scripts for text examples and exercises in P. Dalgaard (2008), `Introductory Statistics with R', 2nd ed., Springer Verlag, ISBN 978-0387790534.
# Depends: R (>= 2.6.0)
# Suggests: survival,MASS
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# ZipData: no
# LazyData: yes
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-01-15 09:57:42 UTC; pd
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-01-20 09:50:02 UTC
